category.template: You can report to Mr. Bhisham Malani who is currently Team Lead of NFT as well as Associate Manager of BT Retail. You can reach out to Mohit Sharma and Binit Sinha, both are SSE and senior people in NFT. Ashish Kumar is the Manager of BT Retail project. NF1

Please find NFT team details as follows: Mohit Sharma- BT Sports SSE Binit Sinha –VOSP (Ref) SSE Neha Phadtare- NFT all ASE Nishant Kutade- VOSP (Systest0)SE Priya Hargapur- VOSP (Ref) ASE Smita Kamalapurkar-BT Sports ASE Shubham Bhalerao-VOSP (Ref) ASE Shubham Sharma- VOSP (Systest0) ASE NF2
You can contact the respective team about the overview of the project and KT sessions to get you going in the project. NF3

Various tools used for Performance testing are: Jmeter and LoadRunner: Used for BT Sports, VOSP Testing Blazemeter and HPPC: Used for Load testing of scripts Splunk: Monitoring tool for Reference environment DynaTrace: Monitoring tool configured in room 101 Master Slave config: For Sys0 testing in Room 101 AWS: used as a Staging in Sys0 and Reference Environment NF4
Please refer to BT sheet on following URL - https://ts.accenture.com/sites/BTE2ETesting/Retail/BCP/Lists/TimesheetMar2018/AllItems.aspx NF5

Please refer following steps: 1. Visit https://ts.accenture.com/sites/BTE2ETesting/Retail/BCP/Lists/TimesheetMar2018/AllItems.aspx 2. Open timesheet link with your Accenture credentials 3. Click on New item. 4. Fill out all fields: work stream- NFT, Project release-NFT- BT TV, Activity –Test Preparations, Task – Test Preparation-Scenario/Script, Actual hours (9 hours) and change the Reporting date accordingly. **If you are on vacation/ Sick leave/ public holiday please change following fields accordingly: Activity – Miscellaneous and Task as Vacation/ Illness/Public Holiday/Optional Holiday 5. Click on Save. NF6

We do Testing for BT Retail- STB and TVE components. We have 6 testing environments across which we do testing. Name of environments and the current sprint number they are in. Sys1 (Sp N+2) Sys0 (Sp N+1) Vol E (Sp N+1) Ref (NFT Team Works here, Sp N) Production ( Live environment Sp N-1) Vol D (Sp N-1) Note: N denotes sprint number
NF7

Here's a checklist of what’s expected from you: 1. Get familiar with Performance Testing. 2. Learn to use Testing tools LoadRunner and Jmeter. Coordinate with respective team members for installation and how to use. 3. Script Creation- understanding end user scenario and learn to simulate it by Scripting. Contact respective team members if you need any help. 4. To provide support during actual testing. NF8
